org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition.annotation

Class AnnotationTypeCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition.annotation.AnnotationCondition
      • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.condition.annotation.AnnotationTypeCondition

  • public class AnnotationTypeCondition
extends AnnotationCondition
    Matches on an Annotation type. For example, this would be used if the value of an annotation element is itself another annotation.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler
